libmxcam API Reference

Introduction

libmxcam library allows you to manage the maxim camera over USB with vendor specific commands.
This documentation is aimed at application developers wishing to manage maxim camera over usb.

Library features

  • boot the camera over usb
  • upgrade the camera firmware
  • get the camera information
  • reboot the camera
  • camera configuration records management

Error handling

libmxcam functions typically return MXCAM_OK on success or a non zero value for error code.
a negative value indicates it is a libusb error.
The error codes defined in MXCAM_STAT_ERR as enum constants.
MXCAM_STAT_ERR codes contains error as well as status codes, which are listed on the miscellaneous documentation page.
mxcam_error_msg can be used to convert error and status code to human readable string

Dependent library

  • libusb 1.0
